website_summaries.verdict: A good-sized water bottle with a silicone lid that can be flipped into a small dog water bowl.
pros: Keeps you from having to carry a separate bowl
Comes with a carabiner for hanging on your belt or pack
cons: It is hard to get the water your dog doesn't drink back in the water bottle

customer_reviews.title: A must purchase for Southern summer sniffy walks.
customer_reviews.text: Gather up his leash, fill his bottle with ice water from the fridge and my Chase knows there is fun ahead. I have nothing negative to say about the bottle. Easy to fill, good handle grip and surprisingly light even when full. The scoop is generous in size so would accommodate any size pup. Another plus - pop the cap on the top and you can have a drink too. A plus purchase all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and the size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it right before we took our golden retriever on a road trip. Love the design and the size. It fits in the cup holder and the silicone part stays flat on the ground for the dog to drink from so you don't have to hold on to it. I was able to clip it onto my backpack when we went hiking. It also did not leak at all so I wasn't afraid to put it inside my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Ho

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of this pet bottle. It's made from quality material, and it works as designed... as long it stays upright in your beach bag, backpack or purse. The "cap" for the spout is easily removed and get's knocked off. I've used mine 4 times now and each time water has leaked out onto the contents of the bag. Since most others who purchased are happy with it, It dawned on me that perhaps the one I received is faulty. Hoping I can connect with the manufacturer or seller for more info. Would love to upgrade my star rating on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: An Awkward Solution
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is thin and lightweight, but the top is heavier than expected. The silicon "bowl" is a bit stiff and not easy to snap open. The carabiner and handle both fall into the bowl while in use. In the past I used one of the ones with a stiff plastic "bowl" that flips open. It lasted for years until a fall on hard ground cracked the connection point between bottle and bowl. I'm now going to try a collapsable silicon bowl. It will take up less room in my pack and I can share my water with my dog rather than needing a separate bottle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: I love the “Flap” that folds up & down
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven’t used the water bottle yet, I love the “Flap” that folds up & down, allowing for many positions of use. On the negative side, I haven’t yet found a bottle size that fits the second, smaller threaded portion. So, I’m stuck using the supplied bottle with little hope of finding a replacement or larger capacity one. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for walks with my Jack Russell, and it is thoughtfully and well made, with nice strap and sturdy materials. It's easy to pour the water the dog doesn't want back into the bottle for future use. My pup likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: K. STINNETT

customer_reviews.title: Water doesn't run out very easy, so you have to squeeze the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Works OK. Water doesn't run out very easy, so you have to squeeze the bottle. This usually causes water to shoot out past the rubber drinking area. My lab was getting irritated with it and slapped it with her paw.
customer_reviews.author: Beegs Barley

customer_reviews.title: cap broke off within a few uses and now can't use
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was so adorable for our new puppy. I bought two and both caps have now broken off, so I can't use anymore given these are designed to use during movement (travel, walks, etc). Past my return window and now can't return. So disappointed, because they really are cute. Just poor quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: #ATLUTD

customer_reviews.title: For adventurous doggo parents
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t change a single thing. It works as advertised, squirts water just perfect. My pup loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Nice size,  somewhat messy design
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this product... portable pet water with built in cup. The bottle is a little awkward to squeeze, but will likely loosen with use. My real stumbling block is the basic design that requires me to find back and carry the sloppy bowl. Not a deal breaker, just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.M. in U.S.A

customer_reviews.title: Will exceed your expectations. Love this
customer_reviews.text: The maker of this idea thought of everything. Came with to styles for portable (grappling hook and hand strap). The spout is leak proof so the water stops when tipped over to give to my dog. And honestly it's set up to where rhw bottled water stays clean, meaning I could share the water! VERY cool can't wait to show it off at the dog park!
customer_reviews.author: SWalackas

customer_reviews.title: Not well engineered and over-priced
customer_reviews.text: The leaf/bowl is not quick and easy to deploy. It's actually a bit of a pain. And the the leaf as designed does not hold water well. I could make a used water bottle and a collapsable cup work easier, better, and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: NeoPantera

customer_reviews.title: Great for "on the go" pups
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice water bottle for "on the go" pets. I filled it, chilled it, and it was perfect for my shih tuz to drink from. Great product, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: okay, but watch the top - it might pop off
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars may be too many. The bottle and pet drinking cup are okay, but the silicone plug at the top pops out easily, so watch it closely or you will have a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I always get compliments on it. My doberman is big and still likes it! Safer than using public water bowls at parks.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Wastes water
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay. My dog never drinks out of it. Spout takes forever to fill the "leaf". Undrunk water doesn't pour back in. Wasted water.
customer_reviews.author: svasan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: You have to squeeze out water. It squeezes out a little bit at a time. I usually have to squeeze some out before I am ready to give some to my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My dogs were able to very easily drink from this. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple of months and it's great! Water and "bowl" all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: PWsFinest

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry with you on walks or in the car.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs won’t drink from it. I think it must have a smell that I can’t detect.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog walking water carrier
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for walking the dog. I drink out of the top and she drinks out of the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for walks and other outings
customer_reviews.text: Love the water bottle. The caribener was a little cheap and broke the first time I used it, but I had another one to replace it with.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and it works very well. I dog fell in love with it at the first use!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn DeCosta

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in this purchase
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed in this purchase. I put the "bottle" portion through the dishwasher and it all crumbled even on the top shelf. It doesn't fit a standard water bottle so the thing is absolutely no use to me. Sorry now that I bought two - one for myself and one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl Carter

customer_reviews.title: not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Great product until you wash it. The description should include that it is not dishwasher safe. One would assume that a reusable water bottle and especially one used for animals, is dishwasher safe. It definitely melted. Good company though. They replaced the whole item.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to explain how to use
customer_reviews.text: Difficult for dog walkers to figure out. Not completely intuitive design
customer_reviews.author: Manos

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and functional
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and functional. My one compliant, it would be nice if the bowl part of the product was slightly larger.
customer_reviews.author: ChaChi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and makes it easy to give her a drink where ever we are.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy - my dog immediately took to the idea of drinking from the "leaf".
customer_reviews.author: Zita

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Well worth the money! My dog loves it and it's easy to use. Wish I'd gotten it a year ago!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Younce

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. My German shepherd loves going for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. My German shepherd loves going for walks and this makes taking her easier in the heat of summer.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Erick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It definitely helps on walks. With this I don’t lose have the amount of water on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality & Very Practical / Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Great design with very good materials. A good study in simplicity and aesthetics. Very well priced. Very happy with my purchase. Thanks One additional note: The bottle is not dishwasher safe. Even my dishwasher, with extremely hot water at end of cycle as an alternate for a drying heater coil, deformed the bottle and made it not possible to use anymore. I would like to get another bottle. Water bottles have not fit the varied screw top accommodations.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Doggo won't use it.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and came as advertised, but my dog won't even think about drinking from it, so it does me no good at all. I think the rubber or plastic it's made from is off-putting to her.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce in KY

customer_reviews.title: Works great, convenient
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find! It's so handy and easy to use: just pull the bowl up, remove the bottle cap and squirt the watery into the bowl. Our dog took to it right away and recognizes that it's her bottle and she's getting water - and she gets excited! Commercial water bottles will fit if you run out and have to purchase. It comes with a carabiner so you can fix it to a leash or a belt loop.
customer_reviews.author: CatherineS

product_meta.title: Roysili Portable Dog Water Bottle Expandable Silicone Dog Travel Water Bottle Dispenser Great for Travel Blue

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
